text: This beast-tyrant got a right big horn, swingin' it about like he owns the place. Go chop it off!
Got a live one 'ere. Bounty on their 'ead. Go kill 'em and collect the reward.
Take this git's head and grind their bones. Reward if yoo do.
Orcs an' Goblins are gristly – still, we got one mouthing off. He needs taking down.
Go get a big red angry bat thing. You'll be rich!
Reptiles. Difficult to get into… too many scales. Still, I've got a contract on one of 'em.
Got a git 'ere, finks he's big man… Let's show 'im wot a real big man is!
There's a green Daemon with a bigger gut that yoo! Can't have that, go and take 'im out.
Another Ogre 'as made some waves, some ripples in da bellies of others. Needs takin' down a peg or three.
Contract 'ere for some furry critter. Make 'im dead. If you eat 'im then make sure you fry the eyes.
Go get that weird freak. Far too thin, so not much meat on 'em. Still, it needs to die.
We da true kings! Yet this dead one thinks he's betta than us. Go grind 'is bones to dust!
This squawkin' bird-magician is worth something dead – best kill it, and get some drumsticks!
Got a pirate, one made of rancid meat, that needs takin' down. You up for it?
We like a good goblet of blood, but so does dis git. Best slap 'im about a bit, let 'im know who's best.
Challenge Stone or not, don't care – go find this champion and slap 'im up good!
Take their tents – burn and render the Beastman pens. Treasure if you do.
These Elves like pain. Show 'em some proper pain and break everyfing: walls, doors, tables… legs, arms…
Burn it! Raze it! Break it! Get paid.
Greenskin rubble might have some shiny things in. See wot you can take.
Take the Daemon place for our own. Then fight an' eat till sated.
Plenty of Lizardman ruins about. Make some more.
Make a fire, use that Norse camp for firewood. Let it burn nice an' bright.
Best get over there, and light that fart – the stink gas will ensure it goes up good!
Got some gold for ya, all yer 'ave to do is go and burn that other camp to da ground.
Too many rats about, we 'ave standards! Time for a cull!
Apparently this lot like pain – best go and burn their hovel down then. Reward for ya if you do it.
Find da treasure in those dusty chambers and then bury it in sand. Not like there's any meet on those bones!
Tzee Zeeee-nt-ch - 'owever yoo spell it! Go find where dey live and clear 'em out!
Rumour 'as it plenty of gold there. Once you nab the baubles, best to get a Firebelly to sort it.
The nobs of the Vampires have lots of gold and precious fings from their families. Find and take it!
The Great Maw yearns. Lots of special stuff can be found here. Get it!
A beast-tyrant with a big horn, is terrorising locals, hack down his forces and bring back the beasts horn as proof.
There is a Bounty on an impetuous Dark Elf Raider. Kill them and the reward is ours.
Take thier head and the golds ours.
Greenskin troublemaker needs putting down, should pose no trouble to us.
A Daemon of Blood, has entered this plane, banish them whence they came.
Reptiles. Bit of an odd one but we've hunted stranger in the Drakwald.
Barbarian pillage these lands, lets show them there is a cost to their savagery.
A Daemon of Bile, has entered this plane, banish them whence they came.
Ogres think they can do what they like, lets put this one in his place.
The Rat-Men blight this land, we should exterminate them at every oppurtunity, for we do not know the extent of their plots and machinations.
A Daemon of Tendrils, has entered this plane, banish them whence they came.
The dead should remain dead, make no mistake the intentions of these so-called "Tomb Kings" are evil.
A Daemon of Feathers, has entered this plane, banish them whence they came.
Piracy is a scourge on the world, but we'll gladly take a Pirates hoard from them.
Hack them to pieces, to let this abomination continue is an affront to mankind.
Do not fear Chaos, a strike to the chest will put them down all the same.
Topple their herdstones, lets see them scatter back to the Forests, if we capture one alive we can send it to the Altdorf Zoo.
If we destroy this camp it will hamper their ability to raid the locals and offers some much needed justice.
Raze the settlement, no questions asked but the pay is good.
Drive out the Greenskin infestation from these lands.
Spit out the fear and let's match these dogs Bloodlust, reclaim the land for Order.
What is one more Lizardman ruin when the pay is this good.
Drive back the Barbarians, all the way to the Chaos Wastes if we must.
Do we really fear these bloated bags of flesh? I say hack, hack and hack again and they will eventually fall.
Ogres have taken a local settlement and are bullying the locals, it's time to restore order.
Rat-Men have overflowed from beneath, spilling into every corner of this settlement. Lets exterminate these Vermin and save those who we can.
Apparently this lot like pain – then who are we deny them their twisted pleasures.
There is a lot of treasure to be found in those ancient chambers.
Do not fear the Bird-men, we will them him plucked and boiled.
Pirates hoard a lot of treasure, there should be a lot of gold in this for us.
This place was once peaceful, stricken down by the sickness of undeath. We will cure it with steel and shot.
We must root out Chaos where ever it is found, bring peace to these heretics.
